comments:
Attempting to code assist with an Ant file with an external entity defined with 
an unrecognized protocol results in an error.

Header:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE project [
  <!ENTITY buildmagic SYSTEM "junk://example/common.xml">
]>

Error:

Verified with Jared.
